column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I noticed my bicycle tire was flat this morning when I pulled it out of the garage to go on a ride .
#id=2
#text=I took the bike back into the garage and laid it on it 's side .
#id=3
#text=I thoroughly checked the tire to see what had caused it to go flat .
#id=4
#text=I saw no nails , holes or tears in the tire so I assumed that the tire had simply lost air and needed to be refilled .
#id=5
#text=After then I went into my tool chest until I found my manual air pump .
#id=6
#text=I took the pump back to where I my bicycle was .
#id=7
#text=I removed the cap on the tires stem and carefully set it aside .
#id=8
#text=I then inserted the pump needle into the stem and made sure it fit .
#id=9
#text=I then placed the pump flat on the ground and began pumping air into the tire , all the while monitoring the pressure gauge .
#text=When I saw that the tire was properly inflated I removed the pump from the tire .
#text=I put the stem cap back onto the tire and went out for a ride to make sure the tire was ok .
